I have seen Bitcoin-Qt abort due to running out of fd's during normal operation. My bitcoin.conf has txindex=1. I manually raised the fd limit to 4096 and reran it. I'm tempted to compile from github with a patch loosely like this: 
#include <sys/resource.h>
...
struct rlimit lim;
...
if (getrlimit(RLIMIT_NOFILE, &lim) != -1) {
        if (lim.rlim_cur < 4096)
                lim.rlim_cur = 4096;
        if (lim.rlim_cur > lim.rlim_max)
                lim.rlim_cur = lim.rlim_max;
        setrlimit(RLIMIT_NOFILE, &lim); /* ignore error, or log a warning */

}
ie: try to raise fd limit to either 4096, or the hard limit.. whichever is lower.
title: OSX open file limit is less than LevelDB's assumptions
